name: GenPBR Map Generator
tagline: Generate PBR maps from a base texture using GenPBR API
maintainer: North Star Global LLC DBA GenPBR

network.reason: Connects to GenPBR API service to generate PBR texture maps from base textures. The addon sends image data to the API and receives generated texture maps in response.
